segments.text: I notice the girl is really eager to get a cookie, her hand outstretched and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's watching the boy intently, like she's waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how focused she is on getting that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk, standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both going to be in trouble if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is just pouring onto the floor, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman has any idea what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and make a mess of things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the tension in the air, like something is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as guilty, encouraging him to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I doubt they will.
segments.speaker: PAR
